Package com.googlecode.aluminumproject.context

Interface Summary
Context A context that is used throughout the processing of one template.
ContextEnricher Enriches the context when a template is being processed.
Scope A variable scope in a Context.
 

Class Summary
AbstractContext Convenience superclass for classes that would like to implement Context.
DefaultContext The default context.
DefaultScope The default, map-backed, scope implementation.
ScopeMap A map that contains variables in a certain scope.
 

Exception Summary
ContextException Thrown by contexts when they encounter something unexpected.
